synopsis.text: In 1945, during World War II, the older students at a girls' school in Hiroshima, Japan are sent away to work in military factories, leaving only 220 first-year students behind. These young teenagers try to maintain some semblance of normalcy despite the hardships of wartime and their deserted town. However, on August 7th, their lives are forever altered when Hiroshima is attacked by an American bomber that drops an atomic bomb on the city. This anime broadcast examines the experiences of these students and memorializes the many young lives lost in the nuclear attack.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
